hadiths.text: Uthman b. 'Affan reported:The Messenger of Allah (way peace be upon him) said: He who performed ablution well, his sins would come out from his body, even coming out from under his nails

chapter.ara-name: باب خُرُوجِ الْخَطَايَا مَعَ مَاءِ الْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: Sins exit with the water of wudu’
